statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_year FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_year > 2020;
SELECT tree_species FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE tree_species = 'Apple';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_year = 2022;
SELECT tree_species, COUNT(tree_species) AS tree_count FROM crop_rotation_schedule GROUP BY tree_species;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_year FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Cotton%' ORDER BY rotation_year ASC, crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, tree_species, planting_date FROM agroforestry_system WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE harvest_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT system_name, land_area FROM agroforestry_system ORDER BY land_area ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM crop_rotation_schedule GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT system_name, tree_species, planting_date, land_area FROM agroforestry_system WHERE land_area > 10 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_system WHERE tree_species LIKE '%oak%' AND land_area BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY system_id;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_rotation_order > 1;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM AgroforestrySystem ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandParcel WHERE parcel_area >= 100 AND parcel_location LIKE '%Farm%';
SELECT system_id, system_name, parcel_location FROM AgroforestrySystem JOIN LandParcel ON AgroforestrySystem.parcel_id = LandParcel.parcel_id;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetables';
SELECT system_name, parcel_location FROM AgroforestrySystem JOIN LandParcel ON AgroforestrySystem.parcel_id = LandParcel.parcel_id;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule ORDER BY crop_rotation_order DESC;

SELECT system_name, parcel_location, crop_type FROM AgroforestrySystem JOIN LandParcel ON AgroforestrySystem.parcel_id = LandParcel.parcel_id JOIN CropRotationSchedule ON LandParcel.crop_id = CropRotationSchedule.crop_id WHERE CropRotationSchedule.crop_type = 'Fruits';
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_cycle FROM Crop;
SELECT field_name, field_size, location FROM Field;
SELECT * FROM RotationSchedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, location FROM Field WHERE field_size > 50;
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE rotation_cycle > 2 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY field_size DESC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crop WHERE crop_family = 'Legumes' ORDER BY planting_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25 AND rainfall < 50 ORDER BY observation_date DESC
SELECT fs.field_name, c.crop_name, rs.planting_date, rs.harvest_date FROM Field fs JOIN RotationSchedule rs ON fs.id = rs.field_id JOIN Crop c ON rs.crop_id = c.id ORDER BY rs.planting_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CropRotation ORDER BY rotation_order ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotation WHERE harvest_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT tree_name, scientific_name FROM AgroforestryTrees WHERE soil_type = 'Sandy';
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrients WHERE nutrient_level > 0.5 ORDER BY nutrient_level DESC;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rotation_order DESC;
SELECT tree_name, scientific_name, soil_type FROM AgroforestryTrees WHERE average_height > 5.0;

SELECT CropRotation.id, CropRotation.crop_name, AgroforestryTrees.tree_name, AgroforestryTrees.average_height FROM CropRotation JOIN RotationHistory ON CropRotation.id = RotationHistory.crop_rotation_id JOIN AgroforestryTrees ON RotationHistory.tree_id = AgroforestryTrees.id WHERE AgroforestryTrees.soil_type = 'Silt';
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrients WHERE nutrient_level > 0.5 ORDER BY nutrient_level ASC;

SELECT WeatherConditions.date, WeatherConditions.temperature, RotationHistory.planting_date FROM WeatherConditions JOIN RotationHistory ON WeatherConditions.date = RotationHistory.planting_date WHERE WeatherConditions.rainfall < 50.0;
